text: The Hero Group is a Swiss food company that sells baby food, jam, milks and healthy snacks. It is headquartered in Lenzburg, Aargau, Switzerland. It was founded in 1886. == Other websites == * www.hero-group.ch â€“ Official website Category:19th-century establishments in Switzerland Category:1886 establishments in Europe Category:Food companies of Switzerland Category:Lenzburg District
title: Hero Group
